note.p: Death: Thury, near Clermont, Oise, France (18 October 1845)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1845 No 62 pp 582-583
References: A Cook, 'Rome and the Royal Society, 1660-1740' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 3-19
M Crosland, 'Relationships between the Royal Society and the Academie des Sciences in the late eighteenth century' in NR 2005 vol 59 pp 25-34
Notes: Jean Dominique is the name that appears in R, DSB, and, originally, in BR. Jean has been changed to Jacques in BR, and the latter is the name given in the index to BR.
